titles.title: My Lord How Full Of Sweet Content (easy nice t

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My Lord how full of sweet content I pass my years of banishment Wherere I dwell with Thee In heav'n in earth or on the sea{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}To me remains nor place nor time My country is in every clime I can be calm and free from care On any shore since God is there{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}While place we seek or place we shun The soul finds happiness in none But with a God to guide our way 'Tis equal joy to go or stay{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Could I be cast where Thou art not That were indeed a dreadful lot But regions none remote I call Secure of finding God in all{/lang-eng}
